compliant.section: 您可能希望限制 cookies 的使用。請注意如果您不啟用 cookies，我們網站上的某些功能可能無法正常運作。目前多數的瀏覽器都允許您能更改 cookie 設定。通常可在瀏覽器的選項或偏好選單中找到這些設定。

compliant.legal provisions: Right to object; The data subject shall have the right to object, on grounds relating to his or her particular situation, at any time to processing of personal data concerning him or her which is based on point (e) or (f) of Article 6(1), including profiling based on those provisions.

non_compliant.section:
「不追蹤」瀏覽器設定
有些瀏覽器提供方式註明您不想瀏覽活動被追蹤。我們目前尚未能回應所有不追蹤 (「DNT」) 或類似的訊號，因為我們正在等候網路政策及法律界對於 DNT 定義的共識，及回覆這類訊號的最佳方式。
non_compliant.legal provisions: Right to object; It should be possible for third parties to object to the future processing of their personal data, including for profiling, where such processing is carried out for direct marketing purposes.
non_compliant.amend: The policy should clearly state that the company will honor DNT signals or provide a clear and unambiguous explanation as to why they cannot currently honor such signals, while also providing users with readily available options to opt-out of tracking.
